scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.deploy:backend: echo 'See backend/README.md for Cloudflare Container deployment'
scripts.db:create: cd frontend && wrangler d1 create clash-flow-db
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd frontend && wrangler d1 migrations apply clash-flow-db --local
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd frontend && wrangler d1 migrations apply clash-flow-db
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
